verses.verse: A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> heareth his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4148>instruction<s%>; But a <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> <S%H8085>heareth<s%> not <S%H1606>rebuke<s%>.

A <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> by the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; But the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> shall eat <S%H2555>violence<s%>.
He that <S%H5341>guardeth<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>; But he that openeth <S%H6589>wide<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall have <S%H4288>destruction<s%>.
The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H183>desireth<s%>, and hath <S%H5315>nothing<s%>; But the soul of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> shall be made <S%H1878>fat<s%>.
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H1697>lying<s%>; But a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man is <S%H887>loathsome<s%>, and cometh to <S%H2659>shame<s%>.
Righteousness <S%H6666><s%> <S%H5341>guardeth<s%> him that is <S%H8537>upright<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>; But <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H5557>overthroweth<s%> the <S%H2403>sinner<s%>.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> that maketh himself <S%H6238>rich<s%>, yet hath <S%H7326>nothing<s%>: There is that maketh himself poor, <S%H3605>yet<s%> hath <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1952>wealth<s%>.
The <S%H3724>ransom<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H5315>life<s%> is his <S%H6239>riches<s%>; But the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H8085>heareth<s%> no <S%H1606>threatening<s%>.
The <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiceth<s%>; But the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%>.
By <S%H2087>pride<s%> <S%H5414>cometh<s%> only <S%H4683>contention<s%>; But with the <S%H3289>well-advised<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> gotten by <S%H1892>vanity<s%> shall be <S%H4591>diminished<s%>; But he that <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> by <S%H3027>labor<s%> shall have <S%H7235>increase<s%>.
Hope <S%H8431><s%> <S%H4900>deferred<s%> maketh the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2470>sick<s%>; But when the <S%H8378>desire<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, it is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>.
Whoso <S%H936>despiseth<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> bringeth <S%H2254>destruction<s%> on <S%H3373>himself<s%>; But he that feareth the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> shall be <S%H7999>rewarded<s%>.
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, That one may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.
Good <S%H2896><s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%>; But the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H898>transgressor<s%> is <S%H386>hard<s%>.
Every <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H6213>worketh<s%> with <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; But a <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H6566>flaunteth<s%> his <S%H200>folly<s%>.
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%> into <S%H7451>evil<s%>; But a <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H4832>health<s%>.
Poverty <S%H7389><s%> and <S%H7036>shame<s%> shall be to him that <S%H6544>refuseth<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%>; But he that <S%H8104>regardeth<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> shall be <S%H3513>honored<s%>.

The <S%H8378>desire<s%> <S%H1961>accomplished<s%> is <S%H6149>sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul<s%>; But it is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3684>fools<s%> to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
Walk <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2449>men<s%>, and thou shalt be wise; But the <S%H7462>companion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> shall smart for <S%H7321>it<s%>.
Evil <S%H7451><s%> <S%H7291>pursueth<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%>; But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H7999>recompensed<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%>.

A <S%H2896>good<s%> man leaveth an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children<s%>; And the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> is laid <S%H6845>up<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
Much <S%H7230><s%> <S%H400>food<s%> is in the <S%H5215>tillage<s%> of the <S%H7218>poor<s%>; But there <S%H3426>is<s%> that is <S%H5595>destroyed<s%> by <S%H3808>reason<s%> of <S%H4941>injustice<s%>.
He that <S%H2820>spareth<s%> his <S%H7626>rod<s%> <S%H8130>hateth<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>; But he that <S%H157>loveth<s%> him <S%H4148>chasteneth<s%> him <S%H7836>betimes<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> to the <S%H7648>satisfying<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%>; But the <S%H990>belly<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H2637>want<s%>.
